summary: CHRYSLER CONCORD 2.7 ENGINE DRIVING DOWN HWY OIL LIGHT CAME ON LOUD KNOCKING UNDER HOOD CAR STOPPED  TOWED CAR TO DEALER.  THEY SAID I HAD A BLOWN ENGINE  I CHANGE THE OIL EVERY 3 TO 35 HUNDRED MILES. THEY SAID THAT THE ENGINE HAD EXCESSIVE SLUDGE. AFTER TALKING TO SEVERAL OTHER ENGINE PEOPLE THEY SAID THAT THE 2.7 ENGINE HAS A HABIT OF BLOWING AT AROUND 75000 MILES
